source:
# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#dboOITM = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboOITM.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboOITM.createOrReplaceTempView("dboOITM")

#dboOITB = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboOITB.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboOITB.createOrReplaceTempView("dboOITB")
## Start of the Dim_Item QView scripting translated over to MSSQL

ITEM = spark.sql("""
SELECT ItemCode,
       ItemName,
       ItmsGrpCod,
       CstGrpCode,
       VatGourpSa,
       CodeBars,
       PrchseItem,
       SellItem,
       CardCode,
       SuppCatNum,
       InvntItem,
       U_BOY_TB_0,
       U_SVCTYPE as Service_Type,
       U_DEPOT as Depot,
       "City Logistics New" as Company 
FROM dboOITM
""")
#ITEM.show
ITEM.createOrReplaceTempView("ITEM")

ITEM_GROUP = spark.sql("""
SELECT ItmsGrpCod, 
       ItmsGrpNam,
       "City Logistics New" as Company
FROM dboOITB
""")
#ITEM_GROUP.show
ITEM_GROUP.createOrReplaceTempView("ITEM_GROUP")

ITEM_Expose = spark.sql("""
SELECT i.ItemCode AS `Item_Code1`,
       UPPER(i.ItemName) AS Item1,
       Upper('(' || left(ItemCode, 2) || ' - ' || right(ItemCode, 3) || ')') AS Item_Type1,
       i.ItmsGrpCod as Item_Group_Code1,
       ItemCode || i.Company as  Item_Code_KEY,
       i.Company as Item_Company,
       InvntItem,
       UPPER(ig.ItmsGrpNam) AS Item_Group1
FROM ITEM i
LEFT JOIN ITEM_GROUP ig 
ON i.ItmsGrpCod = ig.ItmsGrpCod
""")
#ITEM_Expose.show()
ITEM_Expose.createOrReplaceTempView("ITEM_Expose")
## Write success message for production script
